meanings.definition: A person who studies or collects shells.
meanings.sent1: The conchologists carefully examined each shell for their collection.
meanings.sent2: Many conchologists enjoy spending time at the beach searching for unique shells.
meanings.sent3: The conchologists had a shell of a time exploring the seashore.
meanings.sent4: The conchologists' passion for shells was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The conchologists' expertise in shells made them stand out in the scientific community.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the scientific study of mollusk shells.
meanings.sent1: The conchologists published a groundbreaking study on mollusk shells.
meanings.sent2: Many conchologists work in research labs studying the intricacies of mollusk shells.
meanings.sent3: The conchologists joked that their love for mollusk shells was 'shell-fish'.
meanings.sent4: The conchologists' dedication to mollusk shells was as solid as a shell's structure.
meanings.sent5: The conchologists' discoveries in mollusk shells revolutionized the field of marine biology.
